search_results.title: Shaila Catherine
search_results.snippet: Shaila Catherine is an American Buddhist meditation teacher and author in the Theravādin tradition, known for her expertise in insight meditation.

search_results.title: Shaila Catherine—Founder and Principal Teacher
search_results.snippet: Shaila studied with several Asian masters in India, Thailand, and Nepal, including H. W. L. Poonja, Nyoshul Khen Rinpoche, and Tulku Urgyen ...

search_results.title: About - Buddhist Author, Shaila Catherine
search_results.snippet: Buddhist author of three books on meditation, Shaila Catherine is a renowned dhamma and meditation teacher and retreat leader.
